short_description: BN Media is an entity that features three cross promoted faith and inspiration brands including Affinity4, Beliefnet, and Cross Bridge.
description: The mission of BN Media is to serve the vast online market for spirituality and inspiration, bringing audio-visual and written content to the masses while helping people make a difference for their favorite nonprofit organization. BN Media achieves this by bridging the gap through which ordinary activities inspire activism, online giving, and volunteerism.

description: Connected Auto provide synergy and communications between academia, public institutions, automobile manufacturers and technology companies in the connected and autonomous vehicle industry.
